text:
Hey Shirley - I found a few! Take a look and let me know what you think:
1) *South Thames College Nursery and Dental Nursing Apprenticeships* at <http://www.south-thames.ac.uk/apprenticeships.html|www.south-thames.ac.uk/apprenticeships.html>
2) There are usually hundreds of Health, Public Service & Care vacancy adverts across London listed at <http://www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch|www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch>, *including many Pharmacy Services Apprenticeships*.
3) Go to <http://www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch|www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch> and input the Ref. number 1318234 for info on apprenticeship in *Dental Nursing in Wandsworth* paying £162-282 p/week). *CLOSING DATE IN 6 DAYS!!*
4) Go to <http://www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch|www.findapprenticeship.service.gov.uk/apprenticeshipsearch> and input the Ref. number 1318273 for info on apprenticeship in *Dental Nursing in Kensington & Chelsea* paying £151-264 p/week). *CLOSING DATE IN 6 DAYS!!*
There looks like there will be loads more listed on that findapprenticeship website - check it out!
